data.title: Me Without You Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Amazon Prime Video & Peacock
data.meta_description: Me Without You is a British drama film that revolves around two neighbor girls who become best friends, but their relationship becomes strained as time passes. The film is written by Laurence Coriat and Sandra Goldbacher, who is also the director. Me Without You is produced by Steve Christian, Finola Dawyer, and Jonathan Olsberg, and […] The post Me Without You Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Amazon Prime Video & Peacock appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News
data.text:
Me Without You is a British drama film that revolves around two neighbor girls who become best friends, but their relationship becomes strained as time passes. The film is written by Laurence Coriat and Sandra Goldbacher, who is also the director. Me Without You is produced by Steve Christian, Finola Dawyer, and Jonathan Olsberg, and it was released worldwide on 23 November 2001.

Here’s how you can watch and stream Me Without You via streaming services such as Amazon Prime Video and Peacock.

Is Me Without You available to watch via streaming?

Yes, Me Without You is available to watch via streaming on Amazon Prime Video and Peacock.

The year is 1973, and Marina and Holly are next-door neighbors from entirely different backgrounds who vow to be friends forever. However, as time continues to pass, their relationship becomes more strained and toxic, with both of them wondering whether they are better with or without each other.

Me Without You stars Anna Friel, Michelle Williams, Oliver Milburn, Trudie Styler, Marianne Denicourt, Steve John Shepherd, and others.

Watch Me Without You streaming via Amazon Prime Video

Me Without You is available to watch on Amazon Prime Video. Prime Video has a myriad of drama films, such as My Fault, Beautiful Boy, Captain Miller, The Tomorrow War, 7500, and many more.

You can watch via Amazon Prime Video by following these steps:

Go to Amazon Prime Video

Select ‘Sign in’ and ‘Create your Amazon account’

Sign up for a Prime Video membership:

$14.99 per month or $139 per year with an Amazon Prime membership

$8.99 per month for a standalone Prime Video membership

Amazon Prime is the online retailer’s paid service that provides fast shipping and exclusive sales on products, so the membership that includes both this service and Prime Video is the company’s most popular offering. However, you can also opt to subscribe to Prime Video separately.

Watch Me Without You streaming via Peacock

Me Without You is available to watch on Peacock. Peacock features a wide range of female-led films like Promising Young Woman, She Said, Lisa Frankenstein, Kajillionaire, The High Note, One for the Money, and many more.

You can watch via Peacock by following these steps:

Go to PeacockTV.com

Click ‘Get Started’

Choose your payment plan

$5.99 per month or $59.99 per year (premium)

$11.99 per month or $119.99 per year (premium plus

Create your account

Enter your payment details

Peacock’s Premium account provides access to over 80,000+ hours of TV, movies, and sports, including current NBC and Bravo Shows, along with 50 always-on channels. Premium Plus is the same plan but with no ads (save for limited exclusions), along with allowing users to download select titles and watch them offline and providing access to your local NBC channel live 24/7.

The synopsis of Me Without You is as follows:

“During a long, hot summer in seventies London, young neighbors Holly and Marina make a childhood pact to be friends forever. For Marina, troubled, fiercely independent, determined to try everything, Holly stays the only constant in a life of divorcing parents, experimental drugs and fashionable self-destruction. But for Holly, a friendship that has never been equal gradually starts to feel like a trap.”

NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
